Package com.pdfjet

Class CompositeTextLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pdfjet.CompositeTextLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    public class CompositeTextLine
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    This class was designed and implemented by Jon T. Swanson, Ph.D. Refactored and integrated into the project by Eugene Dragoev - 2nd June 2012. Used to create composite text line objects.

      • addComponent

        public void addComponent​(TextLine component)
        Add a new text line. Find the current font, current size and effects (normal, super or subscript) Set the position of the component to the starting stored as current position Set the size and offset based on effects Set the new current position
        Parameters:
        component - the component.
